title: Implement CRM-embedded Guidance panel shell for Account & Opportunity views

sections.text: Build the initial in-CRM Guidance surface (per GOLD-72 spec) that renders inside the Salesforce/HubSpot record page for Accounts and Opportunities without redirecting users to Sales_Accelerator. The panel should load the correct record context (CRM object + ID), handle auth/session handoff, and display a basic container state (loading/empty/error) ready for guidance content blocks. This ticket is focused on the embedded container + context wiring; guidance block rendering and copy actions are handled in subsequent tickets.
